title: I Suddenly Became a Mother - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Josei   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Amnesia   Ancient Times   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Charming Protagonist   Childcare   Coming of Age   Cute Children   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Doting Parents   Early Romance   European Ambience   Familial Love   Family   Female Protagonist   Flashbacks   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Kind Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Mysterious Past   Quirky Characters   Royalty   Unconditional Love   Wealthy Characters
author: Bae Hee Jin   Juitong Saetong   쥐똥새똥
description:
One day, wandering the streets, complaining of hunger, a cute boy runs to her and shouts, “Mama!”

The handsome Duke, the father of the child, offers a contract to provide food and lodging when she becomes a nanny.

Lina, the poor beggar, who suddenly had a son, finds out that the dead Duchess looks just like her…

 She tries to recall the lost memories of her past and surprisingly, it was connected to the Duke and the late Duchess.>
